metadata.Title: CVE-2021-20314 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.Description: Stack buffer overflow in libspf2 versions below 1.2.11 when processing certain SPF macros can lead to Denial of service and potentially code execution via malicious crafted SPF explanation messages.

criterions.comment: libspf2 package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
